f.description: Alias of `format`. Specify `jpg`, `webp`, or `png` to convert formats. By default, no conversion will take place.

format.description: Specify `jpg`, `webp`, or `png` to convert formats. By default, no conversion will take place.

h.description: Alias of `height`. Specify a height to downsize image to the specified height, or leave blank for full-size. Won’t upscale image.

height.description: Specify a width to downsize image to the specified width, or leave blank for full-size. Won’t upscale image.

q.description: Alias of `quality`. Specify a number, `1`–`100`, to reduce the image’s quality and filesize. `100` will skip optimization entirely.

quality.description: Specify a number, `1`–`100`, to reduce the image’s quality and filesize. `100` will skip optimization entirely.

svg.description: Alias of `svgo`. Override SVGO default settings.

w.description: Alias of `width`. Specify a width to downsize image to the specified width, or leave blank for full-size. Won’t upscale image.

width.description: Specify a width to downsize image to the specified width, or leave blank for full-size. Won’t upscale image.
